nodes.text: Alien Anthology is a paperback supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was written by Steve Miller and Owen Stephens and published by Wizards of the Coast in October 2001. A web enhancement named Even More Aliens!, detailing three more species, was released on Wizards of the Coast's website.
A revised and expanded hardcover volume called the Ultimate Alien Anthology was released in 2003.
